banners.title: Cash Transfer Program
banners.subtitle: In collaboration with Jaleshwar Municipality, UNICEF Nepal, Unicef Innovation Fund

content.title: Simplifying Access To Cash Relief
content.subtitle: In Jaleshwor Municipality in Mahottari District, through the collaborative efforts of UNICEF and Rumsan - powered by support from UNICEF Innovation - blockchain technology is now being utilized to provide timely cash transfers to those in need.
